nodes.text: Rebreathers were an upgrade of the standard breath mask that was popular in the years during and after the Jedi Civil War. They were equipment, usually facemasks, that let a member of a species breathe in an atmosphere not suited to their physiology. A rebreather regulated its wearer's oxygen supply; however, the mask had the drawback of being ill-suited for use by Wookiees.
Clone trooper and stormtrooper armor contained rebreathers. A99 aquata breathers were one type of rebreather. Bacta tanks used another type of rebreather known as a breather line.
